org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.calcite.cost

Class HiveOnTezCostModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.calcite.cost.HiveCostModel
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.calcite.cost.HiveOnTezCostModel

  • public class HiveOnTezCostModel
extends HiveCostModel
    Cost model for Tez execution engine.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HiveOnTezCostModel.TezBucketJoinAlgorithm
      BUCKET_JOIN is a hash joins where one bucket of the non streaming tables is kept in memory at the time.
      static class  HiveOnTezCostModel.TezCommonJoinAlgorithm
      COMMON_JOIN is Sort Merge Join.
      static class  HiveOnTezCostModel.TezMapJoinAlgorithm
      MAP_JOIN a hash join that keeps the whole data set of non streaming tables in memory.
      static class  HiveOnTezCostModel.TezSMBJoinAlgorithm
      SMB_JOIN is a Sort Merge Join.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.calcite.cost.HiveCostModel

        HiveCostModel.JoinAlgorithm
